Amazing classic shooter, tons of servers and a great, friendly, and skilled community. If you want to get good, play with the best. It’s much more relaxed than GO with all the e-sport tryhards, I love just hopping into a 24/7 death match server and blowing off some steam. The objective mode servers are really great, ranging from casual to competitive. One of my favorite games.

a true classic

Пожалуй одна из единственных игр от Valve, которая мне очень понравилась. Многие, кто играл в CSS, знают 34 версию этой игры, в которую и по сей день играет много людей. Вот. На серверах сообщества я зависал более 6 лет. Особенно Surf+RPG сервера. Я, когда приходил после школы, быстро делал уроки, ел и начина НАГИБАТЬ ЧАЕК. Лучший и единственный нормальный дробовик, пуколка, морковка - мои лучшие воспоминания об этой игре. К моему сожалению эти орудия убрали в CS:GO. Но по сей день для меня нет мультиплэерной игры лучше, чем эта
This game as usual is a masterpiece. For those who want to play tactical shooter games like cs, but does not have a graphics card, css is really great. Never makes you feel boring.

Обзор был бы актуален для своего времени, ведь это был абсолютный фурор, переведя игру на движок соурс. Даже сейчас не зазорно сыграть пару каточек с детьми без крова.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                 
                                                                                          Výhody
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Bohužel lepší grafika je CS:GO (i 1.6 je prorpracovanější)
2. Je to více real
3. Má to lepší default modely než v CS:GO
4. Nejsou tam bedny
5. Nejsou tam klíče
6. Nejsou tam skiny
7. I když tato hra je starší je na ní stále méně cheatů než na CSGO
8. Nejsou zde točicí se lidé
9. Nikdy jsem neviděl že se bugnu ve vzduchu nebo že se spawnu na enemy spawnu
10. Je to vážná hra ale zároveň zábavná
11. Je tu baterka
12. Když miřím na hlavu netrefím nohu
13. Bany neudělují lidé v overwatchi viz. můj starý učet wvw647
14. Z nějakého důvodu to žere méně místa na disku než CSGO a není to blbost
15. Bod 14= Černá magie
16. Unikátní systém výběru teamu můžete si dokonce vybrat skin hráče
17. Lidé u této hry musí použít Brain
18. Jelikož tato hra je starší tak má na svou dobu cool grafiku a hratelnost
19. Download time odpovídá kvalitě této hry
20. Cena odpovídá kvalitě
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------                                                                                  
                                                                                          Nevýhody
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Even though I haven't played this game in 3+ years I'd say it was one of the greatest experiences I've ever had. No matchmaking and community ran servers is what made this game so great. Playing defuse/hostage maps and zombie escape with friends felt so alive. The physics and endless posibilities in movement made it so that everything was possible!
Unfortunately majorty of the community have moved on to CS:GO and other games. Still I'd wonder where this game would be without CS:GO. I've enjoyed every single second I played this game and do not regret playing it for so much!

BEST COUNTER STRIKE GAME WITH MODS EVER.

So it was late 2017, and i really wanted to play CSS cause i didnt play this game for 3 years since then. Since i got it here from steam, i cant stop having fun. This game has the best mods of any Counter-Strike. BHOP, Surfing, Minigames etc. are all examples of its mods. This game is still capable of being good in 2018. 10/10 for this nostalgic game.

brusle4444@seznam.cz

I have played every counter strike, 1.6, Condition zero, Source and CS Go. Counter Strike Source is the best CS game hands down. It is a 15 out of 10 still. This game has revolutionised FPS's. Source is 100X better then CS Go to me for many reasons. In CS Go i have ran into so many people who hack, and 90% of the community in CS GO are under 18 which they should not be playing at all to begin with. Even in Ranked Games in CS GO i've ran into to many hackers.  EVerything in CS GO is a joke and the terminology is for babies. CS Source has ADmins in every server that will ban hackers within 2 minutes, and they have hack viewer where a bot will monitor people who the bot thinks hacks. Source has custom servers as well, you can have no gravity, throwing knives, 1 health, only deagles, a restraint on guns, unlimited money, also with natural servers. Source has all the classic maps which means it has about 20 more maps then CS GO , and also you cant join a match unless its mirage on CS go which is a joke. There are Flashlights in Source. THere is 64 players in Source, the Max players in CS GO is 24......... super lame. The list goes on. All the best players in CS are on Source, if you play source you will be playing against oponents from the original CS games , and not a 10 YR old kid whos father bought him a brand new computer and he has downloaded aim bot on bing within 2 minutes to fullfill his bratty needs. Overall CS GO sucks, Waste of time in every aspect especially hacking. CS GO is probably the best money you will spend on a FPS ever in your life, and the game will never die down due to the fact it is still very hard to find a more fun/ realistic tactical shooter other then CS Source. This was a trend setter in FPS games , never will a game be like CS Source , and never will it be Copied period. You will not regret buying this game. There are still over 20,000 players every day online and thousands of servers full everyday from United STates to Europe. PLain and simple if you like Hardcore realistic/ tactical shooters, dont hesitate to spend the small amount of money.

Playing this game is awesome, but I wouldn't recommend picking it up if you do not have some sort of a nostalgia tie to the Counter Strike series. I remember late nights when I would just chill with my brother and play this game on LAN. Whether it was a 1v1 or  us being on the same team against hard bots, I would always have fun. 

That brings me onto one of the biggest strengths of this game, the bots. If you play a game like CSGO, 1.6 or even Condition Zero, you know that the intelligence of the bots is.... arguable. With this game it is not the case. For all of the official maps, there are virtually no errors with pathfinding or playing the objective. Also, the skill of the bots ranges from kinda easy all the way up to god level. This makes playing the game on a machine without wifi access very, very enjoyable. I probably have over a hundred hours just in bot matches on my old laptop. 

If playing online is more your thing however, I can say that the community is semi alive and you can still find matches at any time of day with people who are friendly and know a lot about the game. On top of that, the game barely has any inserious players anymore so if you are looking to get away from the trolls that exist on CSGO, this is your game. 

I would definitely recommend getting this game either way, this game has a lot of polish and can get you a lot of fun. 

**on an offline computer, time is not logged onto your account so that is why I only have like 20 hours
